Package library.items

Class PeriodicalElectronic

java.lang.Object
library.items.LibraryItem
library.items.PeriodicalMaster
library.items.PeriodicalElectronic
public class PeriodicalElectronic extends PeriodicalMaster
The PeriodicalElectronic class represents an electronic periodical in the library system. It extends the PeriodicalMaster class and includes additional attributes such as file size, file format, and the number of pages.

  • Constructor Details

    • PeriodicalElectronic

      public PeriodicalElectronic(String id, String title, List<Author> authors, String isbn, String publisher, double fileSize, String fileFormat, int numberOfPages)
      Constructor to create a PeriodicalElectronic object.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the electronic periodical.
      title - The title of the electronic periodical.
      authors - The list of authors associated with the periodical.
      isbn - The ISBN of the electronic periodical.
      publisher - The publisher of the electronic periodical.
      fileSize - The size of the electronic periodical file, in megabytes (MB).
      fileFormat - The file format of the electronic periodical (e.g., "PDF").
      numberOfPages - The number of pages in the electronic periodical.

  • Method Details

    • updateDetails

      public void updateDetails(String title, List<Author> authors, String isbn, String publisher, double fileSize, String fileFormat, int numberOfPages)
      Updates the electronic periodical's details, including title, authors, ISBN, publisher, file size, file format, and the number of pages.
      Parameters:
      title - The new title of the electronic periodical.
      authors - The new list of authors.
      isbn - The new ISBN of the electronic periodical.
      publisher - The new publisher of the electronic periodical.
      fileSize - The new file size of the electronic periodical, in megabytes (MB).
      fileFormat - The new file format of the electronic periodical (e.g., "PDF").
      numberOfPages - The new number of pages in the electronic periodical.

    • updateDetailsFrom

      public void updateDetailsFrom(LibraryItem updatedItem)
      Updates the details of the current electronic periodical from another LibraryItem instance. Specifically checks if the provided item is a PeriodicalElectronic instance and, if so, copies over its details (title, authors, ISBN, publisher, file size, file format, and number of pages). If the provided item is not a PeriodicalElectronic, it prints an error message.
      Specified by:
      updateDetailsFrom in class LibraryItem
      Parameters:
      updatedItem - The LibraryItem containing the new data to update this electronic periodical with.
